item.title: Vue and Typescript from scratch using Parcel bundler
item.description: Vue/Typescript with Parcel from scratch For developers looking to get quickly on their feet with a reactive Vue app, there are no shortage of templates, quick-starts and project generators for starting a new project. However… what if you want to create one from scratch? Create the project folder # mkdir my-project // MaKe DIRectory # cd my-project // Change Directory Initialise package.json Using -y skips the interactivity and uses all the defaults.
